00403 #define EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x)      (((x->value->width == 1)                    && \
00404                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_NONE)     && \
00405                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_SIG)      && \
00406                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL) && \
00407                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL)) ? 1 : 0)

00413 #define EXPR_COMB_MISSED(x)        (EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x) & (~SUPPL_WAS_TRUE(x->suppl) | ~SUPPL_WAS_FALSE(x->suppl)))
